abstract: Citadel, Kenneth C. Griffin’s firm, posted returns of about 25 percent in its main investment funds, known as Kensington and Wellington, the firm wrote to investors in letters sent on Thursday.
snippet: Citadel, Kenneth C. Griffin’s firm, posted returns of about 25 percent in its main investment funds, known as Kensington and Wellington, the firm wrote to investors in letters sent on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: It was another good year for Kenneth C. Griffin.

headline.main: Citadel Posted 25% Return Last Year, Beating Industry Again

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
